sourcesContent:
Album detail #{{album.id}}

  • UserId: {{album.albumId}}
  • id: {{album.id}}
  • Title: {{album.title}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { AlbumService } from '../album.service'; import { ALBUMS } from '../fake-db'; import {Album} from "../models" @Component({ selector: 'app-album-detail', templateUrl: './album-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album-detail.component.css'] }) export class AlbumDetailComponent implements OnInit{ album: Album; constructor (private route: ActivatedRoute, private albumsService: AlbumService) { this.album = {} as Album; } ngOnInit(): void { this.route.paramMap.subscribe((params) => { const id = Number(params.get('id')); this.albumsService.getAlbum(id).subscribe((album) => { this.album = album; }); }) } }
